entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 40
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 20
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

SHOWERS
LOWS AROUND 40
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
